commit.message: Use decorated names for linked_symbols on Windows

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,13 @@
+// build-pass
+// only-x86-windows
+#![crate_type = "cdylib"]
+#![feature(abi_vectorcall)]
+
+#[no_mangle]
+extern "stdcall" fn foo(_: bool) {}
+
+#[no_mangle]
+extern "fastcall" fn bar(_: u8) {}
+
+#[no_mangle]
+extern "vectorcall" fn baz(_: u16) {}
